languages.text: "Чувства?! Ты считаешь, что вокруг тебя вертится вселенная, что я должен тебя обожать просто потому, что ты так хочешь — что и ожидалось от развращенно{mf|го|й} властью выскочки! Как и прочие Вольные Торговцы, ты не заслужил{mf||а} Патент ничем, кроме крови. Бледная тень своего прародителя, которого Император наделил священной властью".

"Feelings? You are so convinced that the universe revolves around you, that I'm supposed to adore you just because you want me to — I expected as much from an upstart spoilt with power! Just like other Rogue Traders, you have done nothing to earn your Warrant other than being born into the right blood. You're a pale shadow of your ancestor who received this sacred authority from the Emperor Himself."
languages.original_text: "Чувства?! Ты считаешь, что вокруг тебя вертится вселенная, что я должен тебя обожать просто потому, что ты так хочешь — что и ожидалось от развращенно{mf|го|й} властью выскочки! Как и прочие Вольные Торговцы, ты не заслужил{mf||а} Патент ничем, кроме крови. Бледная тень своего прародителя, которого Император наделил священной властью".

You are so convinced that the universe revolves around you, that I am supposed to adore you just because you want me to — I expected as much from an upstart spoiled with power! Just like other Rogue Traders, you have done nothing to earn your Warrant other than being born into the right blood. A pale shadow of your ancestor who received this sacred authority from the Emperor Himself."

You're a pale shadow of your ancestor who received this sacred authority from the Emperor Himself."

languages.text: 「気持ち？まるで宇宙が自分を中心に回ってるって思ってるんだな。お前が望めば、俺が当然のようにお前を崇拝するとでも？そんな思い上がった権力漬けの成り上がり者には、まさに予想どおりの態度だ。他のローグトレーダーと同じく、お前は『正統な血筋』に生まれたというだけで令状を得た。その特権を皇帝陛下ご自身から与えられたお前の先祖に比べれば―お前など、ただの薄っぺらな影にすぎない」
languages.original_text: "Feelings? You are so convinced that the universe revolves around you, that I'm supposed to adore you just because you want me to — I expected as much from an upstart spoilt with power! Just like other Rogue Traders, you have done nothing to earn your Warrant other than being born into the right blood. You're a pale shadow of your ancestor who received this sacred authority from the Emperor Himself."

traits.locale_text: 「気持ち？まるで宇宙が自分を中心に回ってるって思ってるんだな。お前が望めば、俺が当然のようにお前を崇拝するとでも？そんな思い上がった権力漬けの成り上がり者には、まさに予想どおりの態度だ。他のローグトレーダーと同じく、お前は『正統な血筋』に生まれたというだけで令状を得た。その特権を皇帝陛下ご自身から与えられたお前の先祖に比べれば―お前など、ただの薄っぺらな影にすぎない」

languages.text: "Gefühle? Ihr seid so davon überzeugt, dass sich das Universum um Euch dreht, dass ich Euch verehren muss, nur weil Ihr es wollt – wie man es von einem Emporkömmling erwartet, den die Macht verdorben hat! Wie andere Freihändler habt Ihr Euch Euren Handelsbrief nur durch Geburt in der richtigen Blutlinie verdient. Ihr seid ein blasser Schatten Eurer Vorgängerin, die diese heilige Autorität vom Imperator selbst erhalten hat."
languages.original_text: "Feelings? You are so convinced that the universe revolves around you, that I'm supposed to adore you just because you want me to — I expected as much from an upstart spoilt with power! Just like other Rogue Traders, you have done nothing to earn your Warrant other than being born into the right blood. You're a pale shadow of your ancestor who received this sacred authority from the Emperor Himself."

traits.locale_text: "Gefühle? Ihr seid so davon überzeugt, dass sich das Universum um Euch dreht, dass ich Euch verehren muss, nur weil Ihr es wollt – wie man es von einem Emporkömmling erwartet, den die Macht verdorben hat! Wie andere Freihändler habt Ihr Euch Euren Handelsbrief nur durch Geburt in der richtigen Blutlinie verdient. Ihr seid ein blasser Schatten Eurer Vorgängerin, die diese heilige Autorität vom Imperator selbst erhalten hat."

languages.text: « Des sentiments ? Vous êtes si {mf|convaincu|convaincue} que l'univers tourne autour de vous que vous pensez aussi que je vais vous adorer, car vous l'exigez ! Je n'en attendais pas moins de la part d'{mf|un|une} arriviste avide de pouvoir ! Comme tous les autres libres-marchands, vous n'avez rien fait pour mériter votre lettre de marque, hormis être {mf|né|née} dans la bonne dynastie. Vous n'arrivez pas à la cheville de votre ancêtre qui a reçu cette mission sacrée des mains de l'Empereur Lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "Feelings? You are so convinced that the universe revolves around you, that I'm supposed to adore you just because you want me to — I expected as much from an upstart spoilt with power! Just like other Rogue Traders, you have done nothing to earn your Warrant other than being born into the right blood. You're a pale shadow of your ancestor who received this sacred authority from the Emperor Himself."

traits.locale_text: « Des sentiments ? Vous êtes si {mf|convaincu|convaincue} que l'univers tourne autour de vous que vous pensez aussi que je vais vous adorer, car vous l'exigez ! Je n'en attendais pas moins de la part d'{mf|un|une} arriviste avide de pouvoir ! Comme tous les autres libres-marchands, vous n'avez rien fait pour mériter votre lettre de marque, hormis être {mf|né|née} dans la bonne dynastie. Vous n'arrivez pas à la cheville de votre ancêtre qui a reçu cette mission sacrée des mains de l'Empereur Lui-même. »

languages.text: «¿Sentimientos? Está tan {mf|convencido|convencida} de ser el ombligo del universo que pretende que le adore simplemente porque lo desea. ¡Qué otra cosa cabría esperar de {mf|un arribista ebrio|una arribista ebria} de poder! Al igual que los demás Comerciantes Independientes, usted no ha hecho nada para ganarse su Patente aparte de nacer en la familia apropiada. Es usted una pálida sombra de su antecesora, a quien el mismísimo Emperador concedió su sagrada autoridad».
languages.original_text: "Feelings? You are so convinced that the universe revolves around you, that I'm supposed to adore you just because you want me to — I expected as much from an upstart spoilt with power! Just like other Rogue Traders, you have done nothing to earn your Warrant other than being born into the right blood. You're a pale shadow of your ancestor who received this sacred authority from the Emperor Himself."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sentimientos? Está tan {mf|convencido|convencida} de ser el ombligo del universo que pretende que le adore simplemente porque lo desea. ¡Qué otra cosa cabría esperar de {mf|un arribista ebrio|una arribista ebria} de poder! Al igual que los demás Comerciantes Independientes, usted no ha hecho nada para ganarse su Patente aparte de nacer en la familia apropiada. Es usted una pálida sombra de su antecesora, a quien el mismísimo Emperador concedió su sagrada autoridad».

languages.text: “感觉？原来你真的相信整个宇宙都在围着你转。你以为只要你想让我对你心怀崇拜，我就必须崇拜你！是啊，被权力惯坏了的暴发户还能怎么样呢？你和其他行商浪人没有区别，你们什么都没做过，仅仅是因为投对了胎，就得到了帝国的授状。你的祖先从帝皇手中赢得了这神圣的权力，至于你，不过是祖先的影子罢了。”
languages.original_text: "Feelings? You are so convinced that the universe revolves around you, that I'm supposed to adore you just because you want me to — I expected as much from an upstart spoilt with power! Just like other Rogue Traders, you have done nothing to earn your Warrant other than being born into the right blood. You're a pale shadow of your ancestor who received this sacred authority from the Emperor Himself."

traits.locale_text: “感觉？原来你真的相信整个宇宙都在围着你转。你以为只要你想让我对你心怀崇拜，我就必须崇拜你！是啊，被权力惯坏了的暴发户还能怎么样呢？你和其他行商浪人没有区别，你们什么都没做过，仅仅是因为投对了胎，就得到了帝国的授状。你的祖先从帝皇手中赢得了这神圣的权力，至于你，不过是祖先的影子罢了。”

languages.text: "Hisler mi? Evrenin senin etrafında döndüğüne kendini o kadar inandırmışsın ki sırf sen istiyorsun diye sana tapacağımı düşünüyorsun. Güçle şımartılmış bir sonradan görmeden ne bekliyorum ki? Tıpkı diğer Hür Tacirler gibi Ruhsatname'ye sahip olmak için hiçbir çaba sarf etmedin. Doğru kanla doğman yetti. Bu kutsal otoriteyi bizzat İmparator'dan alan atanın soluk bir gölgesinden ibaretsin."
languages.original_text: "Feelings? You are so convinced that the universe revolves around you, that I'm supposed to adore you just because you want me to — I expected as much from an upstart spoilt with power! Just like other Rogue Traders, you have done nothing to earn your Warrant other than being born into the right blood. You're a pale shadow of your ancestor who received this sacred authority from the Emperor Himself."

traits.locale_text: "Hisler mi? Evrenin senin etrafında döndüğüne kendini o kadar inandırmışsın ki sırf sen istiyorsun diye sana tapacağımı düşünüyorsun. Güçle şımartılmış sonradan görmeden ne bekliyorum ki? Tıpkı diğer Hür Tacirler gibi ,Ruhsatnameni kazanmak için hiçbir çaba sarf etmedin. Doğru kanla doğdun o kadar. Bu kutsal otoriteyi bizzat İmparator'dan alan atanın soluk bir gölgesinden ibaretsin."
